alert.note: Alert for Riverside (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 21 at 12:50PM PDT until further notice by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Southwest California, including the following county, Riverside. * WHEN...Until noon PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flow in the Whitewater River could result in low-water crossings near the river becoming impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1248 PM PDT, Heavy rainfall has occurred in the San Bernardino County mountains, and water is flowing off the mountains and into the Whitewater River. The river will continue to have flow into this evening. - Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Southern Indio, eastern Palm Springs, Coachella, Cathedral City, Palm Desert, Rancho Mirage, Thermal, La Quinta, Mecca and Indian Wells. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
